snippet: Police and military forces pursued Somali attackers and their four foreign hostages, but a police commander said it was possible that the group had crossed into Somalia.
abstract: Kenyan police and military forces pursue Somali attackers and their four foreign hostages taken from a refugee camp, but a police commander says it is possible that the group has crossed into Somalia.
lead_paragraph: Police and military forces pursued Somali attackers and their four foreign hostages, but a police commander said it was possible that the group had crossed into Somalia.

headline.main: Kenya Pursues Somali Kidnappers From Refugee Camp
headline.print_headline: Kenya Pursues Somali Kidnappers From Refugee Camp
